metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4289 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
epan/dissectors/packet-afp.c in the AFP dissector in Wireshark 1.4.x before1.4.15, 1.6.x before 1.6.10, and 1.8.x before 1.8.2 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (loop and CPU consumption) via a large numberof ACL entries.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4289` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwireshark5 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwiretap4 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwsutil4 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
tshark - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark-common - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark-qt - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.1+g01b65bf-2').
